statements: SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = 'provider123';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 'patient456';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments;
SELECT MAX(appointment_date) AS latest_appointment_date FROM appointments;
SELECT MIN(appointment_date) AS earliest_appointment_date FROM appointments;
SELECT AVG(DATE_PART('day', appointment_date)) AS avg_days_between_appointments FROM appointments;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_id FROM appointments;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM appointments;
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = 'provider123' AND patient_id = 'patient456';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = 'provider123' OR patient_id = 'patient456';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = 'provider123' AND appointment_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;

SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004' AND appointment_date <= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY appointment_time ASC;
SELECT provider_id, MIN(appointment_date) AS first_appointment_date, MAX(appointment_date) AS last_appointment_date FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) > 1;
SELECT provider_id, AVG(DATE_PART('day', AGE(appointment_date, CURRENT_DATE))) AS avg_days_since_appointment FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id;

SELECT provider_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM appointment_date) AS appointment_year, SUM(DATE_PART('day', AGE(appointment_date, CURRENT_DATE))) AS total_days_passed FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM appointment_date);
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments, COUNT(CASE WHEN extract(month from appointment_date) = 1 THEN 1 END) AS january_count FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id;

SELECT provider_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY provider_id ORDER BY appointment_date) AS row_num FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2023-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, LAG(appointment_date) OVER (PARTITION BY provider_id ORDER BY appointment_date) AS prev_appointment_date FROM appointments;

SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, LEAD(appointment_time) OVER (ORDER BY appointment_date DESC) AS next_appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174005';

SELECT provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_time - LAG(appointment_time) OVER (PARTITION BY provider_id ORDER BY appointment_date) AS time_between_appointments FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174006';

WITH ranked_appointments AS (SELECT provider_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY provider_id ORDER BY appointment_date) AS rank FROM appointments) SELECT * FROM ranked_appointments WHERE rank <= 5;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) FILTER(WHERE EXTRACT(month FROM appointment_date) = 12) AS december_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) FILTER(WHERE appointment_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00') AS morning_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) FILTER(WHERE appointment_time BETWEEN '12:00:00' AND '18:00:00') AS afternoon_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_id, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY provider_id) AS total_appointments FROM appointments ORDER BY provider_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_id, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Dermatology';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'Chicago';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Orthopedics' AND location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT MAX(provider_id) FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_providers GROUP BY specialty;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_providers GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, MAX(provider_id) FROM healthcare_providers GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY location, specialty;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers OFFSET 10;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist' AND location = 'California'
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'Texas'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'Florida'
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location IN ('Texas', 'California')
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM healthcare_providers
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Pediatrician' ORDER BY provider_id DESC
SELECT AVG(provider_id) FROM healthcare_providers
SELECT MAX(provider_id) FROM healthcare_providers
SELECT MIN(provider_id) FROM healthcare_providers
SELECT UPPER(provider_name) FROM healthcare_providers
SELECT LENGTH(provider_name) FROM healthcare_providers
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_providers GROUP BY provider_id
SELECT AVG(provider_id), MAX(provider_id), MIN(provider_id) FROM healthcare_providers
SELECT provider_id FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiologist' UNION SELECT provider_id FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Neurologist'
SELECT provider_id FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Dermatologist' INTERSECT SELECT provider_id FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Gynecologist'
SELECT provider_id FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Physiotherapist' EXCEPT SELECT provider_id FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Nutritionist'
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id IN (SELECT provider_id FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Surgeon' ORDER BY provider_name DESC)
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM Providers;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date, status FROM Appointments;
SELECT provider_id, patient_id FROM Appointments;
SELECT p.provider_name, a.appointment_date FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, a.appointment_date FROM Patients p JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id;

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.provider_name, a.appointment_date FROM Patients p JOIN Providers pr ON p.patient_id = pr.provider_id JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id AND pr.provider_id = a.provider_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, pr.provider_name, a.appointment_date FROM Patients p, Providers pr, Appointments a WHERE p.patient_id = a.patient_id AND pr.provider_id = a.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'General Medicine';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT pr.provider_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM Providers pr JOIN Appointments a ON pr.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY pr.provider_name;
SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM Patients p JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT pr.provider_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), a.appointment_date)) AS avg_days_since_last_appointment FROM Providers pr JOIN Appointments a ON pr.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY pr.provider_name;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM Providers;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, contact_info FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date, status FROM Appointments;
SELECT p.provider_name, a.appointment_id, a.appointment_date, a.status FROM Providers p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id;

SELECT p.provider_name, pa.patient_name, a.appointment_date, a.status FROM Providers p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id INNER JOIN Patients pa ON a.patient_id = pa.patient_id;
SELECT p.provider_name, pa.patient_name, a.appointment_date, a.status FROM Providers p LEFT JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id LEFT JOIN Patients pa ON a.patient_id = pa.patient_id;
SELECT p.provider_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Providers p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_id, p.provider_name;
SELECT pa.patient_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Patients pa INNER JOIN Appointments a ON pa.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY pa.patient_id, pa.patient_name;

SELECT provider_name, specialty, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Providers p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_id, p.provider_name, p.specialty;
SELECT pa.patient_name, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM Patients pa GROUP BY pa.patient_id, pa.patient_name;
SELECT p.provider_name, MIN(a.appointment_date) AS earliest_appointment FROM Providers p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_id, p.provider_name;
SELECT pa.patient_name, MAX(a.appointment_date) AS latest_appointment FROM Patients pa INNER JOIN Appointments a ON pa.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY pa.patient_id, pa.patient_name;

SELECT provider_name, specialty, MIN(appointment_date) AS earliest_appointment FROM Providers p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_id, p.provider_name, p.specialty;

SELECT provider_name, specialty, MAX(appointment_date) AS latest_appointment FROM Providers p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_id, p.provider_name, p.specialty;

SELECT provider_name, specialty, AVG(DATEDIFF(appointment_date, CURRENT_DATE)) AS average_days_until_appointment FROM Providers p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_id, p.provider_name, p.specialty;
SELECT pa.patient_name, AGE(appointment_date, DATE '2000-01-01') AS patient_age_at_appointment FROM Patients pa INNER JOIN Appointments a ON pa.patient_id = a.patient_id;

SELECT provider_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments, MAX(AGE(appointment_date, CURRENT_DATE)) AS max_waiting_days FROM Providers p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_id, p.provider_name;

SELECT pa.patient_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments, MIN(AGE(DATE '2022-12-31', appointment_date)) AS min_waiting_days FROM Patients pa INNER JOIN Appointments a ON pa.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY pa.patient_id, pa.patient_name;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, location FROM Providers;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, status FROM Appointments;
SELECT * FROM Services;
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM Services;
SELECT service_id, price FROM Services;
SELECT service_id, description FROM Services;

SELECT appointment_id, provider_name, patient_name, appointment_date, status FROM Appointments INNER JOIN Providers ON Appointments.provider_id = Providers.provider_id INNER JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;

SELECT appointment_id, provider_name, patient_name, appointment_date, status, specialty FROM Appointments INNER JOIN Providers ON Appointments.provider_id = Providers.provider_id INNER JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;

SELECT appointment_id, provider_name, patient_name, appointment_date, status, location FROM Appointments INNER JOIN Providers ON Appointments.provider_id = Providers.provider_id INNER JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT provider_name, service_name, description, price FROM Providers INNER JOIN Services ON Providers.provider_id = Services.service_id;
SELECT provider_name, service_name, description, price FROM Providers INNER JOIN Services ON Providers.provider_id = Services.service_id WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id WHERE p.specialty = 'Cardiology' AND a.status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT p.provider_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Providers p LEFT JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_name;

SELECT p.provider_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Providers p LEFT JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id WHERE p.specialty = 'Dermatology' GROUP BY p.provider_name;
SELECT p.provider_name, AVG(s.price) AS avg_price FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id GROUP BY p.provider_name;
SELECT p.provider_name, COUNT(DISTINCT a.patient_id) AS unique_patients FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_name;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Psychiatry' UNION SELECT provider_name, location FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Psychology';

SELECT p.provider_name, a.appointment_date, s.service_name, s.price FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id WHERE p.specialty = 'Pediatrics' AND a.status = 'Confirmed';

SELECT p.provider_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_name HAVING COUNT(a.appointment_id) > 10;
SELECT p.provider_name, MAX(s.price) AS max_price FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id GROUP BY p.provider_name;
SELECT p.provider_name, AVG(DATE_PART('year', AGE(p.date_of_birth))) AS avg_age FROM Providers p JOIN Patients pt ON p.provider_id = pt.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_name;

SELECT p.provider_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments, AVG(s.price) AS avg_price FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id GROUP BY p.provider_name HAVING COUNT(a.appointment_id) > 5;

SELECT p.provider_name, MIN(s.price) AS min_price, MAX(s.price) AS max_price FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id GROUP BY p.provider_name HAVING MIN(s.price) < 50;

SELECT p.provider_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments, SUM(s.price) AS total_revenue FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id GROUP BY p.provider_name;

SELECT p.provider_name, MIN(DATE_PART('year', AGE(p.date_of_birth))) AS min_age, MAX(DATE_PART('year', AGE(p.date_of_birth))) AS max_age FROM Providers p JOIN Patients pt ON p.provider_id = pt.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_name;

SELECT p.provider_name, COUNT(DISTINCT a.patient_id) AS unique_patients, SUM(s.price) AS total_revenue FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id GROUP BY p.provider_name;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM a.appointment_date) = 11 GROUP BY provider_name;

SELECT p.specialty, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS total_appointments, AVG(s.price) AS avg_price FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id GROUP BY p.specialty HAVING COUNT(a.appointment_id) > 20;

SELECT p.provider_name, a.appointment_date, s.service_name, s.price FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id WHERE a.appointment_date::date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT p.provider_name, s.service_name, s.price FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id WHERE s.price > 100;

SELECT p.provider_name, a.appointment_date, s.service_name, s.price FROM Providers p JOIN Appointments a ON p.provider_id = a.provider_id JOIN Services s ON s.service_id = a.service_id WHERE p.specialty = 'Orthopedics' AND a.appointment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments;
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_id, provider_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT provider_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM schedules;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, gender, dob FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT appointment_id, reason, status FROM appointments WHERE status='Scheduled';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis='Hypertension';
SELECT provider_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week='Monday';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id=101;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE provider_id=201 AND status='Cancelled';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty='Dermatology' AND location='New York';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'California' AND specialty = 'Dermatology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15';

SELECT provider_name, patient_name FROM healthcare_providers JOIN appointments ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE appointments.status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';

SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers JOIN schedules ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = schedules.provider_id WHERE schedules.day_of_week = 'Monday' AND schedules.start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';

SELECT provider_name, reason, appointment_date FROM healthcare_providers JOIN appointments ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';

SELECT patient_name, provider_name, appointment_date FROM appointments JOIN patients ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN healthcare_providers ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id WHERE appointments.status = 'Completed';
